name: Underground (itch) (elootam)
description:
Underground

 Underground is a little game made in two weeks by me and another classmate developper.

We've done it during our first year of developpment studies as an end year project.

You control a character with keys and you control the light sphere with your mouse. You can interact with other objects such as buttons with left click.

Controls

Q/D  : Move your character left or right.

Space : Jump.

Mouse : Control the light sphere.

LMB : Interact with objects.

P or Esc : Pause Menu.

Team

Game Design / Prog :  Boulanger Thomas.

Game Design / Prog : Enzo Benedetti.
